column4: Howdy :-) - I want to install capisuite with "sudo apt-get install capisuite". It then installs all the dependencies for it - also the courier mta (mail transfer agent). How can I install capisuite without the mta ? - I have my own which I want to use instead....
sudo apt-get install equivs, use equivs to fake the package installation
So there is no option in apt-get....Thats why I didnt find it ;-)
